mapper.select: SELECT COCO_CD, COCO_NAME , COCO_CREATE_ID , TO_CHAR(COCO_CREATE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS COCO_CREATE_DT FROM COMMON_CODE WHERE COCO_DELFLAG = 'N' AND SUBSTR(COCO_CD, 1, 2) = #{role} AND COCO_PARENT_ID IS NOT NULL ORDER BY COCO_CD ASC
SELECT COCO_CD , COCO_NAME FROM COMMON_CODE WHERE COCO_DELFLAG = 'N' AND SUBSTR(COCO_CD, 1, 2) = #{role} AND COCO_PARENT_ID IS NOT NULL AND COCO_CD = #{coco_cd}
mapper.update: UPDATE COMMON_CODE SET COCO_DELFLAG = 'Y' WHERE COCO_CD = #{coco_cd}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMON_CODE (COCO_CD, COCO_NAME, COCO_PARENT_ID, COCO_CREATE_ID) VALUES(#{coco_cd}, #{coco_name}, ( SELECT COCO_CD FROM COMMON_CODE WHERE COCO_DELFLAG = 'N' AND SUBSTR(COCO_CD, 1, 2) = #{role} AND COCO_PARENT_ID IS NULL ), #{coco_create_id})
mapper.update: UPDATE COMMON_CODE SET COCO_NAME = #{coco_name} WHERE COCO_CD = #{coco_cd}
